name: UAnimNotifyState_TimedParticleEffect
doc:
Timed Particle Effect Notify
Allows a looping particle effect to be played in an animation that will activate
at the beginning of the notify and deactivate at the end.

PSTemplate: The particle system to spawn for the notify state
SocketName: The socket or bone to attach the system to
LocationOffset: Offset from the socket or bone to place the particle system
RotationOffset: Rotation offset from the socket or bone for the particle system
bDestroyAtEnd: Whether the particle system should be immediately destroyed at the end of the notify state or be allowed to finish
